ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He is the Ever-Forgiving, the All-Loving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He is the forgiving and the loving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and He is the Ever Forgiving, the Most Loving
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He is the All-forgiving, the Most Loving One,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And He only is the Oft Forgiving, the Beloved of His bondmen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and He is the All-forgiving, the All-loving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and He is the Forgiving and Loving One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And He is the Fogiving, the Loving,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and He is the All-forgiving, the All-affectionate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And He is the Oft-Forgiving, Full of Loving-Kindness,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And He is Oft-Forgiving, full of love (towards the pious who are real true believers of Islamic Monotheism),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And He is the Forgiving, and the Loving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And He is the Forgiving, the Loving.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:14] and He is the Forgiving, to sinning believers, the Loving, the One Who shows love to His friends through [His acts of] generosity,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And He is the Forgiving) He forgives he who repents of disbelief and believes in Allah, (the Loving) He loves His friends; and it is also said this means: He loves those who obey Him,
